summary: Completed testing of Admin Check-in Management features for B&B La Maisonette di Paestum. All requested features are working correctly: Edit guest modal, document photo upload, Export Questura functionality, and expanded row guest details.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in /admin/media/upload endpoint - was returning _id which is not JSON serializable
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Fixed media upload endpoint to exclude MongoDB _id from response
seed_data_creation: Used existing check-in data (Blocco Airbnb, Ivan De Rosa, Mario Rossi)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin check-in management features tested and working. Backend tests in /app/tests/test_admin_checkins.py cover: admin auth, get checkins, update guest data, export questura, media upload. Frontend tested via Playwright: edit guest modal, export questura modal, expanded row details.

edit_guest_modal.details: Modal opens with all fields (nome, cognome, data_nascita, luogo_nascita, nazionalita, sesso, tipo_documento, numero_documento, scadenza_documento, luogo_rilascio). Photo upload sections for front and back document. Save button works and shows success toast.

document_photo_upload.details: Upload inputs present for front and back document photos. Backend /admin/media/upload endpoint works correctly after fix.

export_questura.details: Modal opens with date range selection. Search finds records and displays preview table. Download button generates file in Alloggiati Web format.

expanded_row_details.details: Clicking chevron expands row to show Ospite Principale section with all guest details (name, birth date, birthplace, nationality, document info).
